name: sign_in
description: Sign in to the app to enable personalized features like search suggestions and Google Contacts integration.
parameters: {'account_credentials': 'What are your account credentials (e.g., email and password)?'}

name: perform_search
description: Perform a search by entering a query into the search box.
parameters: {'search_query': 'What would you like to search for?'}

name: voice_search
description: Initiate a voice search using the microphone button.
parameters: {'voice_input': 'What would you like to say for the voice search?'}

name: navigate_up
description: Navigate up or go back to the previous screen or menu.
